mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expenses (expense_type, category, amount, expense_date, description) VALUES (#{expenseType}, #{category}, #{amount}, #{expenseDate}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE expenses SET expense_type = #{expenseType}, category = #{category}, amount = #{amount}, expense_date = #{expenseDate}, description = #{description}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_type = #{expenseType} ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR expense_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY expense_date DESC
